original_text: Keep away from them! Be sure to keep to your own good way of life. Keep away from them! Be sure to keep to your own good way of life.
korean_text: 그의 길을 피하고 지나가지 말며 돌이켜 떠나갈지어다

sentences.original_text: Be sure to keep to your own good way of life.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 자신의 좋은 삶의 방식을 지켜라.

sentences.original_text: Be sure to keep to your own good way of life.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 자신의 좋은 삶의 방식을 지켜라.
